channel.title: Lives on tdoot's odd little bazaar
channel.description: Recent content in Lives on tdoot's odd little bazaar

item.description: After listening to the “Man Enough” podcast episode on men’s groups with John Wineland, picked up this book from one of the hosts. Surprisingly hadn’t heard of her before but I’m halfway through and thoroughly enjoying it.
started playing paintball again after nearly two years of “retirement”. joined Cap City Charge, a team started by the guy who ran my old team and has a lot of familiar faces.
came across a podcast episode discussing what I think is a healthy view of supportive male friendships.
hugo posts feel like a terrible way to implement a microblog, but here goes. hugo files theme css (still need to sync this fork) surely this gets me to write here more often
